text: "In a Little While" is a 2000 song by Irish rock group U2. It is the sixth track from their 10th studio album All That You Can't Leave Behind and was produced by Brian Eno. The song itself played on half of the Elevation Tour and dedicated to Joey Ramone following his death ==References== Category:2000 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:U2 songs Category:James Blunt songs
title: In a Little While
